FunctionalRequirements.Name: Open API for Health Device Integration
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system must provide open APIs to seamlessly integrate with various health monitoring devices, ensuring data synchronization and real-time updates for elderly users and caregivers.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Modular Architecture for Customization
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The platform should be built with a modular architecture to allow customization of features based on the varying needs of elderly users and caregivers, ensuring flexibility and adaptability.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Secure Data Handling and Encryption
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system must implement robust security protocols, including data encryption and secure data handling, to ensure compliance with healthcare regulations such as HIPAA and GDPR.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: High Accessibility for Low-Tech Literacy Users
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The platform must be designed with high accessibility standards to cater to elderly users with varying levels of technical literacy, ensuring ease of use and intuitive navigation.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Lightweight and Responsive System
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system should be lightweight and responsive, ensuring quick load times and smooth performance even with complex functionalities and integrations.
